name: gemini-code-reviewer
description: An intelligent code review assistant powered by Gemini. Submit your code snippets and receive automated feedback on quality, best practices, and potential issues.

scripts.start: echo "To run locally: 1. Ensure dependencies are met (see package.json). 2. Use a local HTTP server to serve the root directory (e.g., 'npx serve .'). 3. Open index.html in your browser. For local AI, ensure your AI server is running and configured."
scripts.dev: echo "For a development setup with a bundler (e.g., Vite): vite" && exit 1
scripts.lint: echo "Linting not yet configured. Consider adding ESLint."
